imprint_section1_content: This site is operated by the OK Lab Flensburg to showcase the open vacancy map project.
imprint_section2_content: Questions can be sent to hello[at]oklabflensburg.de or via our community chat.
imprint_section3_content: The editorial team ensures the accuracy of published information and responds to takedown requests.
privacy_section1_content: We store only the data that is necessary to provide the vacancy explorer experience and optional analytics.
privacy_section2_content: Personal information is used to authenticate administrators and to secure the admin workspace.
privacy_section3_content: Contact us at privacy[at]oklablensburg.de to request data export or deletion at any time.
terms_section1_content: Do not misuse the map infrastructure, attempt brute force attacks, or spam community endpoints.
terms_section2_content: The platform is provided as-is without uptime guarantees; maintenance windows may occur without notice.
terms_section3_content: We are not liable for outdated listings or third-party data displayed within the explorer.
about_section1_content: Open Vacancy Map helps communities understand the availability of public spaces in real time.
about_section2_content: The project is maintained by volunteers working with municipalities and cultural organizations.
about_section3_content: Submit pull requests, report issues, or reach out if you want to connect your data sources.
map_section1_content: The current map focuses on city-centre cultural venues and will expand as new datasets arrive.
map_section2_content: Markers are generated from open data portals, municipal registries, and verified submissions.
map_section3_content: Upcoming releases will add filters, availability timelines, and export options for organizers.
login_subtitle: Access your admin workspace to manage venues and events.
signup_subtitle: Create your account to start managing venues and events.
forgot_password_subtitle: We will send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password_success: If an account exists for this email, a reset link has been sent.
forgot_password_failed: Could not send reset link. Please try again.
organizer_form_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
